languages.text: {n}Над вами нависает гротескная паукообразная фигура. Ее конечности суетливо двигаются, со стрекотом и щелчками распарывают и сшивают что-то... вашу плоть. Взгляд {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} равнодушен, низкий голос расходится эхом:{/n} "Объект извлечен, образец жив. Тело и рассудок будут предположительно функционировать в пределах нормы, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Над вами нависает гротескная паукообразная фигура. Ее конечности суетливо двигаются, со стрекотом и щелчками распарывают и сшивают что-то... вашу плоть. Взгляд {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} равнодушен, низкий голос расходится эхом:{/n} "Объект извлечен, объект жив. Тело и рассудок будут предположительно функционировать в пределах нормы, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Над вами нависает гротескная паукообразная фигура. Ее конечности суетливо двигаются, со стрекотом и щелчками распарывают и сшивают что-то... вашу плоть. Взгляд {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} равнодушен, низкий голос расходится эхом:{/n} "Объект извлечен, образец жив. Тело и рассудок будут предположительно функционировать в пределах нормы, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs move about busily, chittering and clicking as they rip something up and stitch it back together... and that something is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Your body and sanity are expected to function within the norm, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Une silhouette arachnéenne grotesque vous surplombe. Ses membres s'agitent frénétiquement, cliquetant alors qu'ils déchirent quelque chose avant de le recoudre... Soudain, vous réalisez que c'est sur votre propre corps que s'affaire la créature. Le regard du {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} est indifférent, et sa voix grave résonne dans toute la pièce quand il déclare d'un ton égal :{/n} « Prélèvement de l'échantillon terminé. Le spécimen est en vie. Son corps et son esprit devraient désormais fonctionner selon des paramètres normaux, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une silhouette arachnéenne grotesque vous surplombe. Ses membres s'agitent frénétiquement, cliquetant alors qu'ils déchirent quelque chose avant de le recoudre... Soudain, vous réalisez que c'est sur votre propre corps que s'affaire la créature. Le regard du {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} est indifférent, et sa voix grave résonne dans toute la pièce quand il déclare d'un ton égal :{/n} « Prélèvement de l'échantillon terminé. Le spécimen est en vie. Son corps et son esprit devraient désormais fonctionner selon des paramètres normaux, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}一只宛如蜘蛛的怪诞身影从你头顶掠过，四肢疯狂地挥舞着，发出吱吱嘎嘎的咔嗒声，撕扯着什么东西，又将什么东西缝在了在一起……随后你意识到，它撕扯的正是你的肉体。这只{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}目光冷漠，低沉的声音在房间中回荡。{/n}“目标样本已提取，实验对象还活着。身体与精神的运行状况预计在正常参数范围内，{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}。”
languages.original_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}一只宛如蜘蛛的怪诞身影从你头顶掠过，四肢疯狂地挥舞着，发出吱吱嘎嘎的咔嗒声，撕扯着什么东西，又将什么东西缝在了在一起……随后你意识到，它撕扯的正是你的肉体。这只{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}目光冷漠，低沉的声音在房间中回荡。{/n}“目标样本已提取，实验对象还活着。身体与精神的运行状况预计在正常参数范围内，{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Eine groteske, spinnenähnliche Gestalt steht über dir. Ihre Glieder bewegen sich hektisch, klackern und klickern, während sie etwas auseinanderreißen und dann wieder zusammennähen ... und dir wird klar, dass ihre Leinwand dein Fleisch ist. Der Blick des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} ist gleichgültig, seine tiefe Stimme hallt durch den Raum:{/n} "Die Probe wurde extrahiert. Das Versuchsstück lebt. Körper und Verstand funktionieren voraussichtlich innerhalb normaler Parameter, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine groteske, spinnenähnliche Gestalt steht über dir. Ihre Glieder bewegen sich hektisch, klackern und klickern, während sie etwas auseinanderreißen und dann wieder zusammennähen ... und dir wird klar, dass ihre Leinwand dein Fleisch ist. Der Blick des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} ist gleichgültig, seine tiefe Stimme hallt durch den Raum:{/n} "Die Probe wurde extrahiert. Das Versuchsstück lebt. Körper und Verstand funktionieren voraussichtlich innerhalb normaler Parameter, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Una grotesca figura con forma de araña se alza sobre ti. Mueve frenéticamente sus extremidades, que chasquean y resuenan mientras despedazan algo y lo vuelven a unir... y te das cuenta de que su lienzo es tu cuerpo. El {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} pone una mirada de indiferencia y su voz grave resuena por toda la habitación:{/n} «Muestra extraída. El espécimen está vivo. Se espera que la mente y el cuerpo funcionen dentro de los parámetros normales, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una grotesca figura con forma de araña se alza sobre ti. Mueve frenéticamente sus extremidades, que chasquean y resuenan mientras despedazan algo y lo vuelven a unir... y te das cuenta de que su lienzo es tu cuerpo. El {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} pone una mirada de indiferencia y su voz grave resuena por toda la habitación:{/n} «Muestra extraída. El espécimen está vivo. Se espera que la mente y el cuerpo funcionen dentro de los parámetros normales, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}グロテスクなクモのようなものがあなたの頭上に迫ってくる。その手足はカチャカチャと音を立てながら必死に動き回り、何かを引き裂き、またそれを縫い合わせる…あなたは、そのキャンバスがあなた自身の肉であることに気づく。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の視線は無関心そのもので、低い声が部屋中に響く。{/n} 「サンプルは抽出された。標本は生きている。{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}、身体も精神も通常のパラメーターの範囲内で機能するものと思われる」
languages.original_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."

traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Grotesk, örümceğe benzer bir figür, üzerine çöküyor. Uzuvları çılgınca sallanarak, cıvıldayarak ve tıkırdıyarak bir şeyleri parçalayıp ardından onu geri dikiyor. Üzerinde çalıştığı tuvalin, kendi bedenin olduğunu fark ediyorsun. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenonun{/g} bakışları duygusuz, sesi ise kısık olmasına rağmen tüm odada yankılanıyor.{/n} "Örnek çıkarıldı. Numune hâlâ hayatta. Bedenin ve zihnin normal parametrelerde faaliyet göstermesi bekleniyor {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}.
languages.original_text: {n}A grotesque, spider-like figure looms over you. Its limbs wave frantically, chittering and clicking as they rip something apart then stitch it back together... and you realise its canvas is your flesh. The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}'s gaze is indifferent, and his low voice echoes through the room:{/n} "The sample has been extracted. The specimen is alive. Body and mind expected to function within normal parameters, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Grotesk, örümceğe benzer bir figür üzerine çöküyor. Uzuvları çılgınca sallanarak, cıvıldayarak ve tıkırdıyarak bir şeyleri parçalıyor, ardından onu geri dikiyor. Fark ediyorsun ki üzerinde çalıştığı tuval senin bedenin. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g}nun bakışları duygusuz ve sesi, kısık olmasına rağmen tüm odada yankılanıyor:{/n} "Örnek çıkarıldı. Numune hâlâ hayatta. Bedenin ve zihnin normal parametrelerde faaliyet göstermesini bekliyorum {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}.
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
